content: measurement approx 25 cm 9 75 x 130 cm 51 materials drops alpaca 100 g colour no 0100 off white and use drops vivaldi 100 g colour no 06 off white drops crochet hook size 5 mm / h or the hook size needed to obtain correct crochet gauge crochet gauge 7 x 7 squares = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 with 1 thread in each yarn quality
